channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's Gaza peace plan gets support from regional leaders
item.description: President Trump and White House envoy Steve Witkoff presented Arab and Muslim leaders with an an "outline" for ending the war in Gaza and for post-Ham...

item.title: Trump wears MAGA down with Ukraine reversal
item.description: President Trump's stunning reversal on Ukraine has barely registered in MAGA circles, underscoring how fatigue and indifference have set in after eigh...

item.title: Two detainees killed in shooting at Dallas ICE facility
item.description: Two detainees are dead, and another is in critical condition after a sniper opened fire on a Dallas Immigration and Customs Enforcement facility Wedne...

item.title: Why the FBI is investigating Dallas ICE shooting as "targeted violence"
item.description: The FBI is investigating Wednesday morning's shooting at a Dallas Immigration and Customs Enforcement facility as "targeted violence" potentially driv...

item.title: Scoop: Longtime Trump adviser Budowich departing White House
item.description: White House Deputy Chief of Staff Taylor Budowich plans to leave the administration at the end of the month to return to the private sector, Axios has...

item.title: Trump’s U.N. General Assembly moments that didn’t go as planned
item.description: The White House said a broken escalator and teleprompter could be evidence of sabotage. The U.N. suggested the mishaps might have been due to Trump’s ...

item.title: Trump administration eyes USAID money to advance America First goals
item.description: A State Department plan to reallocate close to $2 billion in foreign aid marks the latest challenge to Congress’ authority over federal spending.

item.title: A frustrated Sen. Van Hollen urges Democrats to take bigger risks
item.description: “This job is not worth it if you constantly have to be putting your finger to the wind,” said Van Hollen (D), the Maryland senator, in a recent interv...

item.title: Trump unveils wall of presidents, with an autopen standing in for Biden
item.description: A White House official said that all presidents are featured, displayed in chronological order, starting with George Washington and going up to Donald...

item.title: After Trump targets H-1B visas, can India lure back skilled workers?
item.description: Indian leaders say the new $100,000 fee for H-1B visas could be a boon for domestic industry. Others say the country will struggle to absorb more skil...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
